About Me

Hi! My name is Fadil and I am 15 years old and currently go to school at SMA Al-Izhar Pondok Labu. I'm currently in the 10th grade in class X MIPA 2. I enjoy various different things such as :

  • Coding
  • Drawing
  • Stocks
  • Math
  • Editing
  • And many more!
